item.title: Project 3: Tomato Disease Classification
item.description: üçÖ This project aims to classify diseases in tomato plants using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN). üåê A FastAPI web server is built to take in requests for images and return predicted diseases with confidence levels. üîó Link to GitHub Repository Model Building The image classification model is built using a CNN architecture implemented with TensorFlow’s Keras API. The model architecture consists of multiple Conv2D and MaxPooling2D layers, followed by Flatten and Dropout layers (with a dropout rate of 0.
